content.raw:
Maybe we could dedicate a bit of time to audit ign-msgs before making a first major release? Not sure if we have a clear deprecation path for messages, so this could become a pain point as we start using them everywhere.

I've been looking at many of the messages lately and there seem to be outdated fields on many messages. One painful but valuable way to tackle this could be to document all the messages.

Another thing which would be interesting to discuss is syncing up ign-msgs and their corresponding SDF elements. I know they serve different purposes, but I feel that SDF fields have generally been more carefully thought about.
